Uses of Interface
com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.TransportBuffer

  • Packages that use TransportBuffer 
    Package Description
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec
    Provides classes and interfaces for encoding and decoding various messages and other data content.
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport
    UPA Transport API package provides classes and interfaces for distributing messages across a TCP/IP based reliable network including Transport, Channel and Server.

    • Uses of TransportBuffer in com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec

      Methods in com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec that return TransportBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransportBuffer EncodeIterator.transportBuffer()
      buffer TransportBuffer to use for encoding
      Methods in com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec with parameters of type TransportBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int EncodeIterator.realignBuffer(TransportBuffer newEncodeBuffer)
      Realigns Transport Buffer's Iterator with buffer when new, larger buffer is needed to complete encoding.
      int EncodeIterator.setBufferAndRWFVersion(TransportBuffer buffer, int rwfMajorVersion, int rwfMinorVersion)
      Sets the encode iterator's buffer and the desired RWF Version on the iterator.
      int DecodeIterator.setBufferAndRWFVersion(TransportBuffer buffer, int rwfMajorVersion, int rwfMinorVersion)
      Sets the Decode iterator's buffer and the desired RWF Version on the iterator.

    • Uses of TransportBuffer in com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

      Methods in com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport that return TransportBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransportBuffer Channel.getBuffer(int size, boolean packedBuffer, Error error)
      Retrieves a TransportBuffer for use.
      Typical use:
      This is called when a buffer is needed to write data to.
      TransportBuffer Channel.read(ReadArgs readArgs, Error error)
      Reads on a given channel.
      Typical use:
      This method is called and returns a buffer with any data read from the channel.
      Methods in com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport with parameters of type TransportBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long EncryptDecryptHelpers.calculateEncryptedSize(TransportBuffer unencryptedInput)
      Calculates the number of byte needed to encrypt the passed in content.
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.decryptBuffer(Channel channel, Buffer bufferToDecrypt, TransportBuffer decryptedOutput, Error error)
      Decrypts by reversing weak encryption on buffer contents
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.decryptBuffer(Channel channel, TransportBuffer bufferToDecrypt, Buffer decryptedOutput, Error error)
      Decrypts by reversing weak encryption on buffer contents
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.decryptBuffer(Channel channel, TransportBuffer bufferToDecrypt, TransportBuffer decryptedOutput, Error error)
      Decrypts by reversing weak encryption on buffer contents
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.encryptBuffer(Channel channel, Buffer bufferToEncrypt, TransportBuffer encryptedOutput, Error error)
      Performs weak encryption on the buffer contents
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.encryptBuffer(Channel channel, TransportBuffer bufferToEncrypt, Buffer encryptedOutput, Error error)
      Performs weak encryption on the buffer contents
      int EncryptDecryptHelpers.encryptBuffer(Channel channel, TransportBuffer bufferToEncrypt, TransportBuffer encryptedOutput, Error error)
      Performs weak encryption on the buffer contents
      int Channel.packBuffer(TransportBuffer buffer, Error error)
      Allows user to pack multiple UPA encoded messages into the same UPA Buffer.
      Typical use:
      This is called when the application wants to perform message packing.
      int Channel.releaseBuffer(TransportBuffer buffer, Error error)
      Releases a TransportBuffer after use.
      A buffer obtained through getBuffer() call is returned to the buffer pool by write() method or releaseBuffer() method.
      int Channel.write(TransportBuffer buffer, WriteArgs writeArgs, Error error)
      Writes on a given channel.
      Typical use:
      This method is called after buffer is populated with a message.
